practice_phrases.target: Are you going to help me?
she wants to help me learn

practice_phrases.known: 我会帮你，但我现在必须走
practice_phrases.target: I am going to help you, but I have to go now

practice_phrases.known: 你能在明天之前帮我吗？
practice_phrases.target: can you help me before tomorrow?

practice_phrases.known: 我想帮他学习英语，因为我喜欢帮别人
practice_phrases.target: I want to help him learn English, because I like to help people
